summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the acceptance and execution of a $74,253 grant amendment from the Seattle-King County Workforce Development Council to continue support for Garfield Teen Life Center programs; increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2001 Adopted Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
